name: Intimacy (gtibo)
description:
Intimacy was a project undertaken in 2019, it's a collection of Interactive animation reflecting its title as a theme.

An interactive poem composed of text image and sound. Intimacy explores the boundary between our usages with technology, ourselves, and others. You can play and interact with it directly in your web browser.

Brush your hand against the tender textures, try to rebuild something that's forever changed, confront the stares of the crowd ..."

This project was entirely done through the html5 Canvas API, every shape are drawn on the fly and are sensible to the user’s interaction

I'm uploading it here, for archive purposes...
